name: Busy Bee
description:
This game was developed by one person so it has many flaws, please point out the flaws and /or downsides, I'll try my best to improve the game design and make it more fun.
Special thanks to Abdullah Konash who created and shared Arabic Support For Unity plugin.

Description


Busy Bee is a relaxing game to get rid of daily stress. Play as a bee and build cells, guard home, collect nectar, do whatever you can to survive the winter.

Features


  • Cute bees graphics reduce the fear of insects.
  • 7 player co-op game.
  • 4 unique classes and skills.


  • More than one way to get food and survive the winter,
    explore and discover different ways.



  • Environmental temperature affects food consumption.
